name: Language Acquisition of French
description: An introduction to the field of first language acquisition from a theoretical perspective. We will study various aspects: the acquisition of phonology, vocabulary, morphology and syntax. The following topics will be dealt with: the relationship between the development of language and the development of other cognitive aspects; bilingualism; the differences and the similarities between first and second language acquisition. [24L, 12T]
prerequisites: LTL225Y5/FRE225Y5/FRE272Y5,FRE240H5, FRE241H5 (or FRE240Y5)/FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent.
